pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download and Open Data Provided by the Copernicus Global Land Service // Download and open manifest files provided by the Copernicus Global Land Service data https://land.copernicus.eu/global/. The manifest files are available at: https://land.copernicus.vgt.vito.be/manifest/. Also see: https://land.copernicus.eu/global/access/. Before you can download the data, you will first need to register to create a username and password.
